trans-unit.source: You can download .files that contain your analytics data so that you can review your stats and info offline.
trans-unit.target: You can download .files that contain your analytics data so that you can review your stats and info offline.

trans-unit.source: You can download .files that contain your analytics data so that you can review your stats and info offline.
trans-unit.target: You can download .files that contain your analytics data so that you can review your stats and info offline.

trans-unit.source: Data is provided in .tsv (tab-separated values) files, which can be opened in a number of programs.
trans-unit.target: Data is provided in .tsv (tab-separated values) files, which can be opened in a number of programs.

trans-unit.source: First, select the app for which you'd like to download info.
trans-unit.target: First, select the app for which you'd like to download info.

trans-unit.source: **Tip** You can choose to download info all of your apps or a specific app.
trans-unit.target: **Tip** You can choose to download info all of your apps or a specific app.

trans-unit.source: Note that you're not limited to downloading a report for the app which you were working in when you accessed the **Download reports** page in its **Analytics** section.
trans-unit.target: Note that you're not limited to downloading a report for the app which you were working in when you accessed the **Download reports** page in its **Analytics** section.

trans-unit.source: Select one of the available reports.
trans-unit.target: Select one of the available reports.

trans-unit.source: Select from the available values in the **Aggregation level** and **Date range** drop-down lists.
trans-unit.target: Select from the available values in the **Aggregation level** and **Date range** drop-down lists.

trans-unit.source: Note that the options may vary depending on the type of report you've selected.
trans-unit.target: Note that the options may vary depending on the type of report you've selected.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Download reports** button, and then save or open the .tsv file.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Download reports** button, and then save or open the .tsv file.
